name: Cephalon Navis - Warframe tracker App
description: Navis for short uses the WarframeStat.us API to display as much useful and necessary information to help you as you travel the solar system without leaving your game.  Features: - Display game news including updates - Supports displaying multiple events - information on acolytes - Cetus and Earth Day/Night cycle - Orb vallis Warm/Cold cycle - Ostron and Solaris United bounties with Timer - Void Fissures - Nightwaves - Darvos Daily Deals - Baro Timer and Inventory - Display Soties and Invasions - links Plains and Vallis maps - Links to useful guides for new players to learn how to fish - supports PC, PS4, Xbox and Switch worldstates   Report bugs or Feature Request to https://github.com/WFCD/navis/issues
